title: How to Respond to “How Much Do You Love Me?” Fun, Sweet, and Romantic Answers

steps.title: “If I ever have to choose between you and donuts, I will definitely choose you."
steps.content: “If I ever have to choose between you and donuts, I will definitely choose you."

steps.title: "I love you so much, I would walk over barefoot on a bed of Legos for you."
steps.content: "I love you so much, I would walk over barefoot on a bed of Legos for you."

steps.title: "More than I should!"
steps.content: "More than I should!"

steps.title: "I love you 2, 3, 4, 5..
steps.content: "I love you 2, 3, 4, 5.. .to infinity."

steps.title: "A million times infinity."
steps.content: "A million times infinity."

steps.title: "More than a kid loves Christmas."
steps.content: "More than a kid loves Christmas."

steps.title: "I love you this much!"
steps.content: "I love you this much!" (Spread your arms as wide as they can go.)

steps.title: "I love you as much as I hate calculus—a lot."
steps.content: "I love you as much as I hate calculus—a lot."

steps.title: "More than there are words in the dictionary."
steps.content: "More than there are words in the dictionary."

steps.title: "I love you more than you love to snore."
steps.content: "I love you more than you love to snore."

steps.title: "I love you more than water is wet."
steps.content: "I love you more than water is wet."

steps.title: "So much that I'll laugh at your jokes."
steps.content: "So much that I'll laugh at your jokes."

steps.title: "I love you enough to let you have the last piece of bacon."
steps.content: "I love you enough to let you have the last piece of bacon."

steps.title: "I love you like I love my morning cup of coffee."
steps.content: "I love you like I love my morning cup of coffee."

steps.title: "Enough to become a better person."
steps.content: "Enough to become a better person."

steps.title: "So much that you make it hard for me to focus on anything."
steps.content: "So much that you make it hard for me to focus on anything."

steps.title: "Think of how much you love me.
steps.content: "Think of how much you love me. Then, add 1. That's how much."

steps.title: "As much as you want me to.
steps.content: "As much as you want me to. How much do you want?"

steps.title: "So much that my heart skips a beat when I see you."
steps.content: "So much that my heart skips a beat when I see you."

steps.title: "You'll never believe how much."
steps.content: "You'll never believe how much."

steps.title: "The smile on my face should tell you."
steps.content: "The smile on my face should tell you."

steps.title: "I'd run out of breath if I described how much I love you."
steps.content: "I'd run out of breath if I described how much I love you."

steps.title: "Isn't it obvious?"
steps.content: "Isn't it obvious?"

steps.title: "To the point of obsession."
steps.content: "To the point of obsession."

steps.title: "Way too much."
steps.content: "Way too much."

steps.title: "It's not humanly possible for me to love you more."
steps.content: "It's not humanly possible for me to love you more."

steps.title: "More than Romeo loved Juliet."
steps.content: "More than Romeo loved Juliet."

steps.title: "So much that I'll always stand by your side."
steps.content: "So much that I'll always stand by your side."

steps.title: "I'll love you until time runs out."
steps.content: "I'll love you until time runs out."

steps.title: "A little more every day."
steps.content: "A little more every day."

steps.title: "So much that just the thought of you makes me light up inside."
steps.content: "So much that just the thought of you makes me light up inside."

steps.title: "I love you so much that you'll never be able to get rid of me."
steps.content: "I love you so much that you'll never be able to get rid of me."

steps.title: "I love you bunches and bunches."
steps.content: "I love you bunches and bunches."

steps.title: "So much that you've ruined me for anyone else."
steps.content: "So much that you've ruined me for anyone else."

steps.title: "I can't tell you, but I can show you."
steps.content: "I can't tell you, but I can show you."

steps.title: "Twice the amount that you think I do."
steps.content: "Twice the amount that you think I do."

steps.title: "So much that I'll never let you down."
steps.content: "So much that I'll never let you down."

steps.title: "More than you love me!"
steps.content: "More than you love me!"

steps.title: "How much do I need oxygen to survive?"
steps.content: "How much do I need oxygen to survive?"

steps.title: "Enough to be your lover and your best friend."
steps.content: "Enough to be your lover and your best friend."

steps.title: "Enough to know that my heart belongs to you."
steps.content: "Enough to know that my heart belongs to you."

steps.title: "My love is as countless as the grains of sand on the beach."
steps.content: "My love is as countless as the grains of sand on the beach."

steps.title: "I love you so much, sometimes too much."
steps.content: "I love you so much, sometimes too much." [1] X Research source

steps.title: "If you don't know, I must not be trying hard enough."
steps.content: "If you don't know, I must not be trying hard enough."

steps.title: "I love you the most."
steps.content: "I love you the most."

steps.title: "I love you to the moon and back."
steps.content: "I love you to the moon and back."

steps.title: "I love you from here to the end of the universe."
steps.content: "I love you from here to the end of the universe."

steps.title: “I love you like the earth loves the sun.”
steps.content: “I love you like the earth loves the sun.”

steps.title: "My love for you is like a black hole—limitless and infinite."
steps.content: "My love for you is like a black hole—limitless and infinite."

steps.title: "My love can move mountains and rivers."
steps.content: "My love can move mountains and rivers."

steps.title: "I love you as I love myself—you are part of me."
steps.content: "I love you as I love myself—you are part of me."

steps.title: "More than words can say."
steps.content: "More than words can say."

steps.title: "If I loved you more, my heart would burst."
steps.content: "If I loved you more, my heart would burst."

steps.title: "So much that you're stuck with me forever."
steps.content: "So much that you're stuck with me forever."

steps.title: "So much that I'd do anything as long as I was with you."
steps.content: "So much that I'd do anything as long as I was with you."

steps.title: "I love you so much that I can't imagine my life without you."
steps.content: "I love you so much that I can't imagine my life without you." [2] X Research source

steps.title: "My love for you is as big as the universe."
steps.content: "My love for you is as big as the universe."

steps.title: "More than you can imagine."
steps.content: "More than you can imagine."

steps.title: "You are my life—beginning to end."
steps.content: "You are my life—beginning to end."

steps.title: "I love you with every atom in my body."
steps.content: "I love you with every atom in my body."

steps.title: "You are the thing that makes my life worth living."
steps.content: "You are the thing that makes my life worth living."

steps.title: "I can't put into words how much I love you."
steps.content: "I can't put into words how much I love you."

steps.title: "I don't know—my love for you is immeasurable."
steps.content: "I don't know—my love for you is immeasurable."

steps.title: "I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone."
steps.content: "I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone." - The Lord of the Rings

steps.title: "The very thought of you and I forget to do the little ordinary things that everyone ought to do."
steps.content: "The very thought of you and I forget to do the little ordinary things that everyone ought to do." - Nat King Cole

steps.title: "You are the sunshine of my life, that's why I'll always stay around."
steps.content: "You are the sunshine of my life, that's why I'll always stay around." - Stevie Wonder

steps.title: "I love you very much, probably more than anybody could love another person."
steps.content: "I love you very much, probably more than anybody could love another person." - 50 First Dates

steps.title: "I love you more than I love anything, anyone, even myself, for I am not me without you."
steps.content: "I love you more than I love anything, anyone, even myself, for I am not me without you." - Jerry Maguire

steps.title: "All of me loves all of you."
steps.content: "All of me loves all of you." - John Legend

steps.title: "More than words can witness or your thoughts could guess."
steps.content: "More than words can witness or your thoughts could guess." - William Shakespeare

steps.title: "How do I love thee?
steps.content: "How do I love thee? Let me count the ways..." - Elizabeth Barrett Browning

steps.title: “I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.”
steps.content: “I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.” - Leo Christopher
